com.loyauty.util.io
Class PropertiesFileWrapper

java.lang.Object
  com.loyauty.util.io.PropertiesFileWrapper

public class PropertiesFileWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

A simple wrapper on Properties that encapsulate the file loading and the access to properties.

Author:
Muthanna
